options.name: Reinforced Mind
options.description: You have dedicated your life to combat and discipline. You gain +2 maximum resolve. Additionally, when you complete a favorable rest, recover 2 resolve.

options.name: Stride of the Cheetah
options.description: You gain +1 skill with fitness. Additionally, gain +1 movement speed and roll a bonus dice when rolling defense checks against attack of opportunities.

options.name: Breath of the Dolphin
options.description: You gain +1 skill with endurance. Additionally, your swim speed becomes equal to your movement speed and you can hold your breath for twice as long.

options.name: Reaction : Flow Like Water
options.description: In response to you successfully defending against a melee attack and taking no damage, immediately move to an adjacent tile. Until the start of your turn, you roll an extra dice on defense checks. This ability can stack up to 3 times, granting 3 bonus dice.

options.name: Action : Flying Kick
options.description: You leap towards a target within 3 units using your fitness or acrobatics skill as the attack check, dealing 3 physical damage for each successful attack dice. If you traveled the entire 3 units, you deal 4 physical damage per dice instead.

options.name: Action : Palm Strike
options.description: You strike a creature with an unarmed attack that deals no damage, but forces the target to make a concentration or endurance check, or they become stunned. The check required is equal to 2 times the total amount of dice that hit the target.

options.name: Monk's Discipline
options.description: Gain +1 skill with concentration and +1 skill with resilience.

options.name: Master of Staves
options.description: Gain +1 skill with simple melee weapons and +1 deflection while not wearing armor.

options.name: Master of Fists
options.description: Gain +1 skill with unarmed attacks and +1 evasion while not wearing armor.

options.name: Daily Action : Cleansing Focus
options.description: You cleanse your mind, removing any dazed or stunned conditions from you. After removing one of those conditions, roll a concentration check; if the result is over 9, you gain 2 resolve. If the result is over 15, you gain 3 resolve and your action is refunded.
